New Records: Arshdeep Singh conceded 51 runs in the first over of the match
Washington Sundar took 2 wickets for 22 runs
Key Match Events: Daryl Mitchell hit three sixes off Arshdeep Singh in the final over
Indian spinners exploited New Zealand's weakness with effective spin
Pre-Game Insights: Sanjay Bangar noted that Arshdeep Singh's deliveries were 'hit me' deliveries
Hardik Pandya used spinners early, allowing Washington Sundar to extract spin from the surface
Post-Match Reflections: Arshdeep Singh's expensive spell was a key factor in the match
Sanjay Bangar praised Hardik Pandya's use of spinners
Miscellaneous Highlights: India was in trouble after losing 3 wickets for 33 runs in the first 6 overs
